refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the amount of memory consumed by PHP script or allocated by system to PHP process

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
real_usage
Set this to &true; to get total memory allocated from the system to the PHP process, including unused memory pages. If not set or &false; only the memory used by PHP script is reported.
PHP tracks only memory that is allocated by the internal function emalloc().

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns the memory amount in bytes.
